name: laryngoscope
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device for examining the larynx (= the organ containing the muscles that create the human voice or animal sounds), or for putting a tube into the throat: A laryngoscope is used to expose the epiglottis.
More examplesFewer examplesThe breathing tube is usually introduced with the assistance of an instrument called a laryngoscope.The laryngoscope must be inserted gently but with firm manipulation when required.The soreness is probably related to use of the laryngoscope, the instrument used by your anaesthetist to see where to place the tube.One of the main complications when using a laryngoscope is dental damage to the patient's upper teeth.
